review: I really am more than satisfied with this product, its kind of amazing what all it can do being such a small device. The setup was beyond simple, it came already set to my Prime account so I just plugged it into the TV and was set to go. I currently have rather slow internet service (15mbs) but even with that the operation is snappy and smooth through the screens and with the smart pre-buffering it runs Prime video and Netflix in HD. I am sure it would be an even better experience with a faster connection. The included controller is not voice operated as with the larger Fire TV decive, but that has not been an issue for me at all, and if you want voice operation you can download a free  Fire app for your phone that does the same thing. Overall, very pleased. This has made watching videos and TV series much easier and fun; there are many available apps and options that I have yet to explore as well.
